title: UPDATE: Firewall Error after Champion Select
body:
Hi folks,

As some of you may know, there were a reports from players having connectivity issues and lag during games over the last few days.

We've identified a possible fix for this, and have made some changes this morning.

It is possible there may be some impact for players connecting to games, so if you receive a firewall error after champion select, please let us know here so we can investigate.

What we will need from you

* What city are you in?
* What internet provider do you use?
* What type of connection do you have? (eg. ADSL / Cable / Fibre)
* Do you connect your computer to your home network via wireless or via a network cable?
* Do you use any kind of VPN service?
* Run the [network diagnostic tool](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/tools/network-logs)
* Email the information to ocelivereports@riotgames.com

Best Regards,
-Mindstar

**12/02/2015 - Quick update:** We've been working with ISPs on this issue, and we should have been able to resolve it at this point for people using CallPlus / Flip, who seem to have been affected by this pretty heavily.
It would be great to hear if this helps get you playing again.

replies.body:
I am in 20 min queue dude, my whole team lagging. Even beginners bots games lagging. I lost 3 ranked games cause I was disconnected. 

Riot blaming all the ISP's in New Zealand including the best internet service provider "Spark". i seriosuly cannot blame Riot, since Oceania does not give them good profit, so why even bother with people in Oceania. 

I am trying to find other games to play until Riot plans to provide some decent playability for Oceania servers.

Even INTERNET CAFES CANNOT RUN THIS FRICKING GAME LOL.

RIOT DOES NOT CARE ABOUT OCEANIA SERVER NEITHER NEW ZEALAND OR AUSTRALIA WHATSOEVER. 

I cannot connect to NA SERVER neither.

Riot, 

I have been playing league for years now but what has made me lose it the past couple of weeks has been this firewall issue, I keep getting it mostly every time it connects from char select lobby to a pre-game loading screen, it then goes blank and I eventually get a firewall issue dialog box... now after being in game and complaining I got told it was my internet connection but after investigating my connection I found no issues with the firewall on my side plus I have 2 different ADSL connections with a load balance in between which shouldn't cause my IP to be flagged as suspicious as its actually quite common these days for this setup.. I literally play this game alot but lately I have been staying away from it because I just continue to get put in the leaver penalty group and have a 20 minute ban for alot of matchmaking which is wrong in itself, I seriously don't see the point in wasting someones life for 20 minutes, plus it auto matchmakes as soon as the 20 minutes is finished so if your not in front of the screen watching your count down you will have to wait another 20 minutes with no progress on your leaver penalty !!!

I would actually find being banned for a couple days more suitable because I really just see this system as "perfect in the idea and intentions" but in reality with network disruptions, issues with servers and all sorts of other uncontrollable circumstances players that have done right by the community are being wronged by the system that has been put in place to try protect them in the first place from AFK players.

I still see AFK's alot even with the new system and still fail to see the point because of that. You may get rid of bad players but you are also catching good players in your nets which will make them turn away from lol if it keeps going on.


Note -  I have tried the ipconfig /release | /renew | /flushdns which worked the first couple of times but has become useless now for me.
I'm getting this right now. I've checked my firewall settings and nothing has been blocked. I can still access riotgames.com as well. I'm not sure what to do. :(

TBH its honestly a load of shit. It's 99% nothing to do with your firewall.
Its just some mean synergy between a hyperactive leaver-buster and a bullshit firewall error.
Its a good way to get people to quit the game is what it is.

Ha... I'm serious it make me crazy
I have a 20 minute wait penalty. 
Is it my fault? or your fault Riot?

> [{quoted}](name=KTM,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=WlGElu7g,comment-id=001f,timestamp=2015-03-19T01:44:19.270+0000)

> I have a 20 minute wait penalty. 

I've had one slapped on too. The leaver-buster is a hypersensitive system and "Nothing they can do about it".... :/

This problem was fixed for me before the patch and now its back. Doesn't that point to it being a problem on your end? Its really annoying to have this constant instability.  its great you guys patch every week or two but how about making sure it doesn't break peoples games first

> [{quoted}](name=EVANGELION 01,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=WlGElu7g,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-30T03:56:40.973+0000)
>
> This problem was fixed for me before the patch and now its back. Doesn't that point to it being a problem on your end? Its really annoying to have this constant instability.  its great you guys patch every week or two but how about making sure it doesn't break peoples games first

Hi EVANGELION,

We are sorry you are experiencing this issue, and we are working to resolve this as quickly as possible.

Just so you are aware, the patch has nothing to do with the firewall error. We made some network changes this morning as we found a possible solution to this problem.

I understand the issue may of been fixed for you over the last week with some other changes that we made, but we are aware that for other players it was not. Thus we have made another change to help alleviate the issues.

If you have not already done so, could you please complete the steps above so we can analyze your data and see what could be causing this for you. If you have (I can see some reports coming in) then I thank you and we will work to get this resolved as quickly as we can.


Thank you again for your patience.

-ToxicHawk
None of those steps are remotely relevant. Take the blame for your servers being trashy. Fix it now Riot.

Hey Guys,

Thanks to everyone that has submitted their reports so far, from the first wave of reports we have been able to identify a few ISP's (that seem to be affected the most). From the initial data we have an idea what could be the issue and have reached out to said ISP's to trouble shoot with their engineers.

If you are still having this issue, please make sure to complete the steps outlined above, including running the Network Diagnostic, and send your information and report to ocelivereports@riotgames.com.

Once we receive your report we will be able to start analyzing the data and comparing it to logs we have collected for commonalities and possible issues.

Thanks again for your patience while we work with the relevant ISP's and teams to nail this down.

-ToxicHawk
This issue is NOT with the ISP's. The issue is with YOUR SOFTWARE and YOUR servers Riot. FIX IT NOW.

Still having this issue with Time Warner ISP. Was working fine and unexpectedly getting the firewall error. Since no firewall settings have been changed I know for a fact this is on your end Riot. I'm getting leaver buster attacking me and it's your fault 100%. Fix this problem now, not in another three years. It's a free game sure, but millions upon millions of people pay for extra content from your servers and we deserve not to be treated like this. FIX IT NOW RIOT.
can a red please illustrate the problem that is occuring.
25 days
three weeks now.

Just signed up to flip.

Can log in, but seconds after am faced with a disconnect message. All my other internet dependent applications are working.
I have done the League network test and uploaded my file.

Hopefully we can have this fixed soon!

:l this is bullshit... i played 2 matches today morning.. and now all of a sudden this shit appears.. and now in low priority.. i have complained and complained... this shit is never gonna be resolved... i for one.. have had this issue for ages.. it goes.. and just when i finish playing those bloody low priority matches it comes back... WELL 5 MORE BLOODY GAMES WITH THIS BULLSHIT. thats it.. i am fucking uninstalling this game and going to some other mmorpg.. :l ... I get an unfair error and im a 'leaver'... Bullshit errors and bullshit system dealing with leavers..

If people are having trouble with firewall errors, here's how to fix it:

(windows 7 (should be similar in other windows versions))
1. open control panel
2. open 'system and security' tab
3. open 'windows firewall'
4. on the left hand side, click 'allow a program....')
5. click 'change settings'
6. locate League of Legends (either on the list, or by pressing 'allow another program', and finding it there)
7. check every box you can, and click OK
8. now, on the left, click 'advanced settings'
9. on the left choose 'inbound rules'
10. locate League of Legends, and if there are any grey ones; right click them and choose 'activate rule'
11. once all of the League of Legends ones (probably about 4) are green, you should be good to go - at least it worked for me ;)
(My OS language is not in english, and couldn't be bothered to change it, so I just translated all the names in ' ' - the names might not be 100% what I wrote here)

I'm having these firewall issues, even when I completely turn off my firewall.

**What type of connection do you have? (eg. ADSL / Cable / Fibre)** Fibre optic
**Do you connect your computer to your home network via wireless or via a network cable?** Network Cable
**Do you use any kind of VPN service?** No

When I try to reconnect it says something like "Unable to reconnect, check Firewall settings". The first time, 3 people mysteriously DCd simultaneously only a few seconds earlier so I imagine they had the same thing happen.

The worst part is, I got "LeaverBustered" the first time and had a queue delay for 5 games. So now my queue delay is going to be even longer, which is a joke when it's not my fault at all. Please let me know who to talk to in order to remove my undeserved queue delay.

City: Adelaide, Australia
ISP: Adam Internet
ADSL, wireless connection to home network
No VPN

Hey I have recently encountered the issue with my firewall blocking the connection after champion selection.

Much appreciated if this problem could be resolved, cheers.

Getting pretty ridiculous, been over a week with this problem. The worst thing is that it comes and goes constantly. Last night I played a few norms with friends, decided to hit ranked before bed and hello, firewall error, -25 lp cause %%%% you. Today I started a custom game to check if we were good, yup, sweet as. 10 mins later, try a norm and no dice. I know you guys are working on it and stuff but like should we just not play ranked? Pretty annoying I don't get a loss prevented for this but I know the other 4 people don't either. It's not just ruining the individual's game, 4v5s suck. I never understood why there wasn't some precautionary measure or system to prevent losses on 4v5s when a player doesn't even join the game cause it happens all the time, even before this problem.

I will try on ranked 5's and post a result soon xd
